#summary Method blueprintTypeByTypeName details

= /blueprintTypeByTypeName/(typeName) =

Blueprint information for given blueprint typeName.

== Attributes ==

|| blueprintTypeID || Number ||
|| blueprintTypeName || String ||
|| maxProductionLimit || Number ||
|| productCategoryID || Number ||
|| productGraphicIcon || String ||
|| productTypeID || Number ||
|| productTypeName || String ||
|| wasteFactor || Number ||
